name: Inhuman Crossing
description:
This game was made for the Art Jam and includes a work of Sachiko Kasama as its inspiration. A big theme of the work is that of surveillance, which is used as the driving point of this project. 

The player finds them self in the Shibuya crossing next to the Hachiko who has been transformed into the hellhound Cerberus. As it is night Cerberus cannot see the player but when they enter one of the spotlights he's right on their tail. 

The goal of this game is to lure Cerberus out of the main crossing area so he can be transformed back into Hachiko.
